Html:
Hi, Roman,

I'm trying to implement my Cobol compiler using Irony. Can you explain some basic stuff, like LanguageCompiler(), CompilerContext(), SourceFile(), EvaluationContext() and context.Runtime? When, where, why and how should I use that?

Keep your good work.

Thanks.

Nilo
Well, no docs so far, sorry. Just follow samples. Have a look at CodeProjectÂ articles, links at home page (codeplex.com/irony).
